title: PIMA of 2016
content: Promoting Integrity in Medicare Act of 2016 or PIMA of 2016 This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1)nbsp, expandnbsp, Medicare's prohibition on physician self-referrals to include, with specified exceptions,nbsp. Certain advanced imaging, anatomic pathology, radiation therapy, and physical therapy services. And (2) establish increased civil monetary penalties for violations of the self-referral prohibition with respect to those services. The Centers for Medicare amp, Medicaid Services shall conduct anbsp, compliance reviewnbsp, with respect to such referrals.
